name: Devansh Baldwa
top_product: Our top product is Uniforms. We cater to everyone in need of bulk uniform needs.
ideal_referral: Schools, Colleges, Hospitals, Hotels, Security & Facility Management Services & Corporates looking for Uniforms, Shoes, Bags, Textiles & more.
top_problem_solved: Until 2025, Ravindra Bharathi Educational Society in Hyderabad had never provided uniforms to their 25,000+ students across all branches. We partnered with them to create uniforms that truly represents their institution’s identity. From concept to delivery, we completed the entire process—design, sampling, production, and distribution—within just 90 days of confirmation.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story is from my very first meeting as a visitor. I was new to business and naturally a bit shy, so opening up, meeting new people, and talking about my business felt completely outside my comfort zone. I still remember how awkward I felt at first. But as members started initiating conversations, I began to relax and enjoy the experience. By the end of the meeting, I was one of the last people to leave—fully immersed in networking and connecting with everyone. That experience changed my perspective on business networking.

name: Nidhhi P Voraa
top_product: 1. Personal Numerology & Tarot Consultations – One-to-one sessions offering clarity on relationships, career, finances, and life purpose. 2. 5-Year Numerology Wealth & Fortune Report – A detailed Loshu Grid and destiny analysis with remedies, predictions, and guidance. 3. Lab-Certified Healing Crystals – Premium crystals like Pyrite, Amethyst, Citrine, Black Tourmaline, Rose Quartz, and Clear Quartz, energized for abundance, protection, and emotional balance. 4. Ritual Kits & Crystal Gifting Solutions – Curated spiritual kits, corporate gifting boxes, and premium crystal-infused lifestyle products from Mioura. 5. Abundance & Protection Crystals – Specialized crystal sets designed for wealth manifestation, nazar/evil-eye protection, and energy cleansing.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is someone who is seeking clarity and guidance in life through tarot and numerology consultations — whether it’s about relationships, career, finances, or spiritual well-being. I also welcome referrals for Tarot Reading Events — including corporate gatherings, private parties, elite clubs, spiritual retreats, and celebrity events — where I can create a memorable and insightful experience for guests. For my crystal brand Mioura, my ideal referrals are corporates, premium lifestyle buyers, and wellness communities looking for authentic, lab-certified healing crystals, ritual kits, and spiritual gifting solutions. Additionally, I value introductions to CSR heads and philanthropists who may resonate with supporting the seva work of Madhav Foundation, serving widowed Matajis in Vrindavan.
top_problem_solved: One of my clients, a businessman, came to me feeling completely stuck. Despite working hard, his efforts weren’t giving results, and he kept facing losses. I studied his numerology chart and immediately saw where the blockages were. I guided him to change his mobile number, adjust his name spelling, and even rename his business to bring it in alignment with positive vibrations. I also redesigned his logo scientifically, created his visiting card as per vastu principles, and suggested crystals and remedies tailored for his business and personal growth. Within a short period, he began seeing noticeable improvements — smoother opportunities, better client responses, and a clear shift in energy and confidence.
my_favourite_bni_story: I felt truly honored when I was invited as a Tarot Card Reader to the Telangana State Police IPS Officers’ Wives Association event. It was a privilege to offer tarot readings for such an esteemed gathering and to see how much clarity, positivity, and curiosity the sessions brought to them. This experience reaffirmed my belief that tarot is not just guidance, but a meaningful way to connect with people from all walks of life — even at the highest levels of society.

name: Prashanth Rao
top_product: Our top product is the Wozart Switch Controller – a retrofit smart device that turns any ordinary switchboard into a smart one without changing existing wiring or switch plates. It allows users to control lights and fans through a mobile app, voice assistants like Siri, Alexa, or Google, or even automate routines based on time or presence. No rewiring, no mess — just plug and play. Ideal for new homes, renovations, or even occupied homes that want to upgrade to smart living without hassle.
ideal_referral: Premium Home Builders & Developers working on high-end apartments, villas, or gated communities who value technology, aesthetics, and customer satisfaction. Examples of Builders We’d Love to Work With: Prestige, Aparna, My Home, Lodha, DSR, Sobha, Puravankara, Brigade, etc.
top_problem_solved: The biggest problem we solve is the complexity and mess usually associated with home automation. Most homeowners think going smart means breaking walls, changing switchboards, or installing bulky devices. With Wozart, that’s no longer true. Our retrofit solutions work with existing wiring and switchboards, allowing you to upgrade any home—new or old—into a smart home without hassle. We make smart living simple, elegant, and future-ready.

name: Prateek Agarwal

my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite Bni story would be how just a 5 min call with my chapter member got me a whole hotel that needed furnishing and the whole project was done in the client's budget that he was keen to give me his another hotel without even a single thought
